alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 10:30PM EDT until July 24 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1030 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Milford, or 7 miles northeast of Montrose, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, New Milford, Lanesboro, Gibson, Lakeview and Lakeside. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
